00020 #ifndef BRICS_3D_OBJECTMODELPLANEFROMLINES_H_
00021 #define BRICS_3D_OBJECTMODELPLANEFROMLINES_H_
00022 
00023 #include "brics_3d/algorithm/segmentation/objectModels/ObjectModelPlane.h"
00024 
00025 namespace brics_3d {
00031 class ObjectModelPlaneFromLines : public ObjectModelPlane {
00032 protected:
00034         static const double geometryEpsilon=1e-3;
00035 
00036 public:
00037 
00038         struct line{
00039                 Point3D pbase;
00040                 std::vector<double> director;
00041         };
00042 
00043 
00044 
00047         inline bool contains(const line &line,Point3D &point){
00048                 double dx=point.getX()-line.pbase.getX();
00049                 double dy=point.getY()-line.pbase.getY();
00050                 double dz=point.getZ()-line.pbase.getZ();
00051                 if (abs(dx)<geometryEpsilon&&abs(dy)<geometryEpsilon&&abs(dz)<geometryEpsilon) return true;
00052 
00053                 //       dx          dy          dz
00054                 //if -----------=-----------=-----------, point is inside the line.
00055                 //   director[0] director[1] director[2]
00056 
00057                 return (abs(dx*line.director[1]-dy*line.director[0])<geometryEpsilon)&&
00058                                 (abs(dx*line.director[2]-dz*line.director[0])<geometryEpsilon)&&
00059                                 (abs(dy*line.director[2]-dz*line.director[1])<geometryEpsilon);
00060         }
00061 
00074         inline void crossProduct3D(
00075                 const std::vector<double> &v0,
00076                 const std::vector<double> &v1,
00077                 std::vector<double> &v_out){
00078                 assert(v0.size()==3);
00079                 assert(v1.size()==3);
00080                 v_out[0] =  v0[1]*v1[2] - v0[2]*v1[1];
00081                 v_out[1] = -v0[0]*v1[2] + v0[2]*v1[0];
00082                 v_out[2] =  v0[0]*v1[1] - v0[1]*v1[0];
00083         }
00084 
00085         ObjectModelPlaneFromLines(){};
00086         virtual ~ObjectModelPlaneFromLines(){};
00087         void getSamples (int &iterations, std::vector<int> &samples);
00088         bool computeModelCoefficients (const std::vector<int> &samples, Eigen::VectorXf &model_coefficients);
00089         void computeRandomModel (int &iterations, Eigen::VectorXf &model_coefficients, bool &isDegenerate, bool &modelFound);
00090         inline int getNumberOfSamplesRequired(){return 4;};
00091 
00092 
00093 };
00094 
00095 }
00096 
00097 #endif /* BRICS_3D_OBJECTMODELPLANEFROMLINES_H_ */
